description: Customer Login requires a registered customer account to exist.
mitigation_plan: Develop in the same sprint to ensure availability.

description: The Admin User Dashboard needs user data from the registration process to display.
mitigation_plan: Backend API for admin can be developed against the same user schema being created for registration.
impact_if_delayed: Admin dashboard would show an empty list until user data is available.

description: The 'Admin Views Pending Registrations' feature requires pending vendor accounts to be created by the registration flow.
mitigation_plan: Schedule VND-001 in a sprint before or concurrent with ADM-001.
impact_if_delayed: The admin approval workflow would be blocked.
